metadata.title: Basic SSP
metadata.remarks: A basic SSP created to capture basic functionality for interoperability testing.

system-characteristics.description: An SSP that captures the state of the ExampleCo Enterprise Network.

information-types.title: C.3.5.7 Information Management Information Type
information-types.description: Information Management involves the coordination of information collection, storage, and dissemination, and destruction as well as managing the policies, guidelines, and standards regarding information management.

authorization-boundary.description: The ExampleCo Enterprise Network authorization boundary encompasses all hardware, software, and firmware components that store, process, or transmit ExampleCo information.

components.title: ExampleCo Password Policy
components.description: Corporate policy that establishes password requirements for all ExampleCo systems.

control-implementation.description: Detailed description of how ExampleCo implements the controls defined in the Basic Catalog A (Basic Profile).

by-components.description: ExampleCo has purchased and installed Auto-Lockout Pro on all endpoints within the authorization boundary to enforce automatic session lock after a defined period of inactivity.
ExampleCo enforces the password complexity requirements outlined in the ExampleCo Password Policy across all systems within the authorization boundary.
